quest.name: Growing Pains
journal: Gunu Vanu seeks a helping hand for his rite of passage.

For Zundu nestlings to complete their rite of passage, they must offer the elder something of value to the tribe. Gunu Vanu's plan is to take the beak of a tsanahale, as his father once did, and prove himself a mighty warrior. Meet him deep within the Blue Window.
In the Blue Window, Gunu Vanu states that he will keep watch while you see to the tsanahale. Lure out one of the beasts by whistling loudly and dispatch it in the usual fashion.
The tsanahale is no more, and its beak is yours. Give it to Gunu Vanu so he may finally complete his rite of passage.
Gunu Vanu is overjoyed to receive the tsanahale's beak and is eager to present it to the elder shaman. Accompany Gunu Vanu to the shaman's roost in Ok' Zundu.

Though glad to receive Gunu Vanu's offering at first, the elder shaman grows skeptical that the nestling could slay a tsanahale by himself. Gunu Vanu subsequently admits to being helped by you, and the shaman commands him to redo the rite of passage─this time without attempting to exploit a loophole in the rules.
objectives: Lure out and slay a tsanahale.
Present the tsanahale beak to Gunu Vanu.

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Before netherling helps, Gunu Vanu explains rite of passage. All Vanu must make offering to elder shaman that proves valuable to Zundu.

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Some hunt, some fish, some dance like leaves in wind. All contribute to glory and richness of tribe. Alas, elder shaman ridicules Gunu Vanu's offering seven times! But with netherling's help─and Gunu Vanu's plan─elder shaman's ridicule turns to astonishment.

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Gunu Vanu thinks long on next offering, and like clouds which part before sun, an idea comes! Gunu Vanu passes trial in same way as Father: hunts mighty tsanahale and presents its beak to elder shaman. Proves he is no longer nestling!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Netherling strong and fierce as spring monsoon, so tsanahale surely falls like wilting leaves before our wrath. Come to hunting grounds with mightiest weapon─Gunu Vanu awaits!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: At last, netherling is come! Takes so long, Gunu Vanu almost run─I mean, doze off!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Tsanahale far from clever. With whistle, netherling lures out and strikes down like lightning in the night. Its beak serves as proof of our deed!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: ...What of Gunu Vanu? He stands apart with a griffin's eyes and keeps watch over netherling, lest shehe fall prey to other fell beasts!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Lure out tsanahale with whistle, then strike it down. And do not forget to bring its beak!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: ...Huh!? Oh, yes, Gunu Vanu sees all! And netherling brings the tsanahale beak?

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Yes...this beak helps Gunu Vanu escape drudgery of nestlingdom! Elder shaman cannot deny such magnificent offering! Come, netherling, ride winds of haste to shaman's roost!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Aanu Vanu, most benevolent and wise elder, behold! Gunu Vanu brings eighth offering for rite of passage. With this he grows from nestling and becomes a true member of Zundu!

dialogue.name: AANUVANU
dialogue.text: Well, well! Like father before him, Gunu Vanu comes with beak of savage tsanahale. Such an offering is most unexpected.

dialogue.name: AANUVANU
dialogue.text: But...as surely as moon sets in west, Gunu Vanu shies from hunt and runs from bloodshed. Does he expect elder shaman to believe this is no longer so?

dialogue.name: AANUVANU
dialogue.text: Do not lie to Aanu Vanu... Gunu Vanu not become warrior overnight. Does he receive help from another? Gunu Vanu knows rules─help from others is forbidden! He knows if he dares break, consequences most grave!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Wait! Elder, make not hasty decisions! Slayer of tsanahale not Gunu Vanu, this is true, but slayer is not other Vanu─it is netherling!

dialogue.name: GUNUVANU
dialogue.text: Rules of rite forbid help from Vanu, but make no mention of netherlings. See, elder shaman─Gunu Vanu breaks no rules!

dialogue.name: AANUVANU
dialogue.text: Hmph. Gunu Vanu twists words as weaver braids rope. Very well. Aanu Vanu acknowledges Gunu Vanu not break rules─but nestling he remains! Gunu Vanu must try again.
